attributes.action: Inform the tax payer how much 'targets and inspections' cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Council Tax keeps on rising and Council's keep reducing services enforce ALL public bodies to report how much money they spend on collecting performance data for the Government, paying the Audit Commisssion, employing staff to manage performance indicators, etc. Perhaps then the public will realise the complete waste of time and money this work is and does not really improve services.
